meanings.sent1: She misdoes her homework by copying from others.
meanings.sent2: He often misdoes his chores by forgetting important steps.
meanings.sent3: The robot misdoes its tasks when its programming gets mixed up.
meanings.sent4: The artist misdoes the painting, creating a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Misdoing the recipe can lead to a disastrous meal.

meanings.definition: An act of doing wrong or improperly.
meanings.sent1: His misdoes caused trouble for the entire team.
meanings.sent2: The misdoes of the company led to financial losses.
meanings.sent3: The misdoes of the clown entertained the audience unintentionally.
meanings.sent4: The misdoes of the past haunted him in his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The misdoes of the student were forgiven with a sincere apology.
